src_text: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
ref_text: Siminoff wamba wixi owusumbixilu wabandekesa kyoso kyamoneka mwene mu muvu wa 2013 ilayelaye ya Shark Tank mukonda dya kudituna owundonda wa dikwatekesu dya startup.
hyp_text: Siminoff yakwala njala yalunguluka ku mbandu yaxi wa 2013 ya itantu ya Shark Tank, njala yaxi wa mbandu yaxi ya kaximbu ya kijimbu kikulu kwa kaximbu kwa njala.
